original_text: When they had gone through the whole island as far as Paphos, they came upon a certain magician, a Jewish false prophet named Bar-Jesus.
korean_text: 온 섬 가운데로 지나서 바보에 이르러 바예수라 하는 유대인 거짓 선지자인 마술사를 만나니

sentences.original_text: When they had gone through the whole island as far as Paphos
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 온 섬을 바보스까지 통과했을 때

sentences.original_text: they came upon a certain magician
a Jewish false prophet named Bar-Jesus
